content:
I have a new issue building today: the fhir-udap-security-ig repo built successfully 2 days ago and the repo is unchanged. I triggered a manual rebuild today and I am now getting a build failure with:

Stack Dump (for debugging):                                                      (00:08.0200)
/scratch/ig-build-temp-5O2TJO/repo/template/scripts/ant.xml:8: 'version' must be defined in ig.ini.  e.g. '2.0'

However, version = 0.1.0 is included in the sushi-config.yaml file.
I tried adding the version to the ig.ini but the build failed again, now complaining that the FHIR version was missing (which is also defined in sushi-config.yaml). Sushi ran without errors but it appears that the parameters from the config file are not getting picked up.
the build log is here
Any ideas on how to fix this would be greatly appreciated.
this isn't a sushi config. this is an error in the template that is known and being worked on
(See discussion on #IG creation > build with hl7.fhir.template.)
